text: Margaret Mary Beckett, Baroness Beckett GBE (née Jackson; born 15 January 1943) is a British Labour Party politician. Beckett was born in Ashton-under- Lyne, Lancashire. She went to the Notre Dame High School for Girls in Norwich, then to the University of Manchester Institute of Science of Technology. She was the Member of Parliament for Lincoln from 1974 to 1979. She was the MP for Derby South from 1983 to 2024. She was Leader of the Opposition from May 1994 to July 1994. ==Notes== == Other websites == * Parliament * BBC Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Leaders of the Opposition (United Kingdom) Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:Politicians from Lancashire Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024
